attributes.action: Make it illegal to base motor insurance premiums on gender.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be made illegal for UK insurance companies to base motor insurance premiums on an individuals gender, in much the same way as it is illegal to base premiums on religious beliefs, ethnic origin or sexual orientation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
